医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
使用芬太尼的人开始低剂量丁丙诺啡未能达到预期效果在 COVID-19 大流行期间，芬太尼过量服用激增，医生们迫切希望找到帮助患者的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Low-dose-initiation-of-buprenorphine-for-people-using-fentanyl-fails-to-deliver-expected-results.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Low-dose-initiation-of-buprenorphine-for-people-using-fentanyl-fails-to-deliver-expected-results.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a023e3db-ed4b-4bb3-aee7-3f21e39cf01b Fri, 24 Jan 2025 20:14:01 -0500 Low-dose initiation of buprenorphine for people using fentanyl fails to deliver expected results
研究揭示受过教育和未受过教育的美国人之间的寿命差距在美国 3,000 多个县中，受教育程度最低的人和受教育程度最高的人之间存在巨大的地理差异，且差距不断扩大，受教育程度较高的人的寿命更长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Study-reveals-lifespan-gap- Between-eduated-and-uneducated-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Study-reveals-lifespan-gap- Between-eduated-and-uneducated-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33651009-47e1-452c-b975-1c7a60f8699a Fri, 24 Jan 2025 20:04:59 -0500
麻省理工学院的突破实现了 3D 组织中快速、均匀的蛋白质标记麻省理工学院开发的一项新技术使科学家能够以前所未有的速度、均匀性和多功能性标记完整的 3D 组织中数百万个单个细胞的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/MIT-breakthrough-enables-fast-and-uniform- Protein-labeling-in-3D-tissues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/MIT-breakthrough-enables-fast-and-uniform- Protein-labeling-in-3D-tissues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a584044-85c7-4ebe-8681-8fbd659bdb48 Fri, 24 Jan 2025 20:00:12 -0500 MIT breakthrough enables fast and uniform protein labeling in 3D tissues
基于人工智能的血液检测可能会彻底改变儿童长新冠病毒的诊断有一天，借助人工智能 (AI) 的帮助，可以通过验血来客观地诊断儿童的长效新冠肺炎。事实上，天主教大学罗马校区——Fondazione Policlinico Universitario Agostino Gemelli IRCCS 和 Ospedale Pediatrico Bambino Gesù IRCCS 的一项研究强调了儿科血浆中 Long Covid 的分子特征，并使用了能够根据血样结果进行诊断，准确率达93%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/AI-based-blood-test-could-revolutionize-diagnosis-of-Long-Covid-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/AI-based-blood-test-could-revolutionize-diagnosis-of-Long-Covid-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53f66ad7-d32b-4bd0-a83b-c0eac9915023 Fri, 24 Jan 2025 19:55:33 -0500 AI-based blood test could revolutionize diagnosis of Long Covid in children
新加坡国立大学研究人员开发 DNA 条形码纳米粒子用于靶向癌症治疗新加坡国立大学 (NUS) 的一组研究人员开发了一种新方法，使用带有 DNA 条形码标记的金纳米粒子来提高癌症治疗的精度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/NUS-researchers-develop-DNA-barcoded-nanoarticles-for-targeted-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/NUS-researchers-develop-DNA-barcoded-nanoarticles-for-targeted-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87e00de6-4373-43ce-92e7-ac53f878da1f Fri, 24 Jan 2025 19:50:00 -0500 NUS researchers develop DNA barcoded nanoparticles for targeted cancer therapy
综述强调线粒体 Ca2+ 失衡在神经退行性疾病中的作用线粒体是细胞稳态的重要细胞器，调节 ATP 产生、活性氧 (ROS) 管理和 Ca2+ 信号传导等过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Review-highlights-the-role-of-mitochondrial-Ca22b-imbalance-in-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Review-highlights-the-role-of-mitochondrial-Ca22b-imbalance-in-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2843194c-5056-4cc1-9d46-01900e2ce610 Fri, 24 Jan 2025 19:41:57 -0500 Review highlights the role of mitochondrial Ca2+ imbalance in neurodegenerative diseases
医疗补助保险、社会经济劣势与心脏移植后较差的生存率有关加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心领导的一项新研究强调了社会经济劣势、医疗补助保险与心脏移植后较差的存活率之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Medicaid-insurance-socioeconomic-disadvantage-linked-to-poorer-survival-after-heart-transplant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Medicaid-insurance-socioeconomic-disadvantage-linked-to-poorer-survival-after-heart-transplant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=512b2a3e-e6ed-4be2-860e-66c1daaeccf0 Fri, 24 Jan 2025 19:37:57 -0500 Medicaid insurance, socioeconomic disadvantage linked to poorer survival after heart transplant
肝损伤后组织修复所需的关键免疫细胞我们的肝脏含有许多不同类型的免疫细胞。 Charlotte Scott 教授（VIB-根特大学炎症研究中心）及其同事的最新研究表明，损伤后的组织修复需要其中一种细胞类型的特定激活状态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Key-immune-cells-required-for-tissue-repair-following-liver-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Key-immune-cells-required-for-tissue-repair-following-liver-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49a6514e-4108-461b-8b38-5508fccf8dae Fri, 24 Jan 2025 19:33:24 -0500 Key immune cells required for tissue repair following liver injury
美国退出世界卫生组织对全球健康意味着什么几十年来，美国在决定全球卫生政策和计划的方向方面拥有相当大的权力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/What-a-US-exit-from-the-WHO-means-for-global-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/What-a-US-exit-from-the-WHO-means-for-global-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=357b72de-3285-4af8-a8a3-0a2005a1dda5 Fri, 24 Jan 2025 19:22:18 -0500 What a US exit from the WHO means for global health
研究可以带来更好的药物和合成生物学的新工具蛋白质是生命的引擎，为肌肉运动、视觉和化学反应等过程提供动力。它们的环境——水、脂质膜或其他凝聚相——对于它们的功能至关重要，塑造它们的结构和相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Research-could-lead-to-better-medicines-and-new-tools-in-synthetic-biology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Research-could-lead-to-better-medicines-and-new-tools-in-synthetic-biology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a956ba9-374d-4432-bc34-6cd17a6efefc Fri, 24 Jan 2025 10:59:22 -0500 Research could lead to better medicines and new tools in synthetic biology
